title: Number of cats in the U.S. 2000 to 2017
summary: In general Number of cats in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of cats in millions is slightly decreasing from 2006 to 2011.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2011.
Maximum Number of cats in millions, about 93.6 was reported at Year 2008
The lowest Number of cats in millions, of value 86.4 was reported at Year 2011
